file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content: --- openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: Spring Batch REST version: '0.1' description: REST API for controlling and viewing Spring Batch jobs and their Quartz schedules. license: name: Apache License 2.0 url: http://github.com/chrisgleissner/spring-batch-rest/blob/master/LICENSE servers: - url: http://localhost:50114 description: Generated server url paths: "/jobs/{jobName}": get: tags: - job-controller summary: Get a Spring Batch job by name operationId: get parameters: - name: jobName in: path required: true example: abc schema: type: string responses: '200': description: default response content: application/hal+json: schema: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobResource" "/jobs": get: tags: - job-controller summary: Get all Spring Batch jobs operationId: all responses: '200': description: default response content: application/hal+json: schema: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/CollectionModelJobResource" "/jobExecutions/{id}": get: tags: - job-execution-controller summary: Get all Spring batch job execution by ID operationId: get_1 parameters: - name: id in: path required: true example: 123 schema: type: integer format: int64 responses: '200': description: default response content: application/hal+json: schema: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobExecutionResource" "/jobExecutions": get: tags: - job-execution-controller summary: Find Spring batch job executions by job name and exit code operationId: all_1 parameters: - name: jobName in: query required: false schema: type: string - name: exitCode in: query required: false schema: type: string - name: limitPerJob in: query required: false schema: type: integer format: int32 default: 3 responses: '200': description: default response content: application/hal+json: schema: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/CollectionModelJobExecutionResource" post: tags: - job-execution-controller summary: Start a Spring Batch job execution operationId: put requestBody: content: application/json: schema: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobConfig" responses: '200': description: default response content: application/hal+json: schema: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobExecutionResource" components: schemas: Job: type: object properties: name: type: string links: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Link" JobResource: type: object properties: job: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Job" links: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Link" Link: type: object properties: rel: type: string href: type: string hreflang: type: string media: type: string title: type: string type: type: string deprecation: type: string profile: type: string name: type: string CollectionModelJobResource: type: object properties: links: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Link" content: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobResource" JobExecution: type: object properties: id: type: integer format: int64 jobId: type: integer format: int64 jobName: type: string startTime: type: string format: date-time endTime: type: string format: date-time exitCode: type: string exitDescription: type: string status: type: string enum: - COMPLETED - STARTING - STARTED - STOPPING - STOPPED - FAILED - ABANDONED - UNKNOWN exceptions: type: array items: type: string JobExecutionResource: type: object properties: jobExecution: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobExecution" links: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Link" JobConfig: type: object properties: name: type: string properties: type: object additionalProperties: type: object asynchronous: type: boolean CollectionModelJobExecutionResource: type: object properties: links: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Link" content: type: array items: "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobExecutionResource"

Error: notImplemented: path "/jobExecutions": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [application/hal+json]
